title: Athletic Bilbao 0-2 Barcelona: Talking points as Catalans book Super Cup final place
description: Barcelona are the first team to have earned a place in the final of this season’s Spanish Super Cup, having got past Athletic Bilbao in the semis. Gavi broke the deadlock in the 17th minute, and Lamine Yamal set the final score in the 52nd. The teams Bilbao boss Ernesto Valverde, once in charge at […] The post Athletic Bilbao 0-2 Barcelona: Talking points as Catalans book Super Cup final place appeared first on Soccer News.
author: Veselin Trajkovic

title: Flick hails ´very important´ Barca response to recent struggles
description: Hansi Flick saluted a “very important” response by Barcelona after they put their recent struggles behind them with victory over Athletic Bilbao in the Supercopa de Espana semi-finals. The Blaugrana had topped the LaLiga table following a brilliant start to the season. author: SoccerNews
